instructions: On your phone, touch & hold the Home button. In the bottom left, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Under "You," tap Payments . Tap Get started , and then read the terms of service. To continue, tap Accept . Follow the steps to choose or enter your payment method and delivery address. Tap Done .

On your phone, touch & hold the Home button. In the bottom left, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Under "You," tap Payments . At the bottom, tap Purchase approvals . Choose Always require confirmation or Don t require confirmation .

On your phone, touch & hold the Home button. In the bottom left, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Under "You," tap Payments . At the bottom, tap Purchase approvals . Turn Use fingerprint to confirm on or off.

On your phone, touch & hold the Home button. In the bottom left, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Under "You," tap Payments . From here you can either: Tap Payment method , then choose or add a card. Tap Delivery address , then choose or add an address.
On your phone, touch & hold the Home button. In the bottom left, tap . In the top right, tap your Profile picture or initial . Under "You," tap Payments . Turn Pay with your Assistant on or off.
